about_the_game:
With this additional content, a dress-up outfit will be added to the [Witch Spring 3 Re:Fine　]Eirudy.
To change Eirudy's outfit, please equip it from the possessions menu.
detailed_description:
With this additional content, a dress-up outfit will be added to the [Witch Spring 3 Re:Fine　]Eirudy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
